column4: hello everyone, after i ran this command: update-rc.d a_script defaults, did the a_script run?
no
i must reboot computer?
you use that to control what scripts start and stop when the computer boots.

yo0u can start he script manually if you don't want to reboot
how can i do that?
sudo /etc/init.d/scriptname start stop whatever
i run /etc/init.d/scriptname, then run ps -aux |grep scriptname and this is result:
is that ok?
i wrote that script for shutdown server when power outage
looks like its running then

pull the plug and see
